title: God is Joyful
description:
Readings from:

Psalm 104:31-34

Zephaniah 3:16-17

Hebrews 12:2-3

Today's passages were read by Demelza Ramirez, a member of Imago Dei Anglican Church where she is the Lead Catechist for children ages 9-13. She is a third year seminary student.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
